org.activebpel.rt
Interface IAeWSDLFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
AeWSDLFactory
public interface IAeWSDLFactory

Interface to define a factory mechanism for obtaining a WSDL source

Method Summary
 org.xml.sax.InputSource getWSDLForNamespace(java.lang.String aNamespace)
          Returns the wsdl source for a passed namespace or null if none.

          Returns the url for the wsdl source for a passed namespace or null if none.

          Gets the InputStream for passed wsdl file after first checking catalog for local access (via classpath) to passed url.
 

Method Detail

getWSDLSource

public org.xml.sax.InputSource getWSDLSource(java.lang.String aWsdlUrl)
                                      throws AeException
Gets the InputStream for passed wsdl file after first checking catalog for local access (via classpath) to passed url. The WSDL URL should be an absolute path to the resource.

Parameters:
aWsdlUrl - The url of the wsdl to load.
Returns:
the InputStream representing the passed wsdl url.
Throws:
AeException - If a failure is encountered loading the WSDL Document.

getWSDLForNamespace

public org.xml.sax.InputSource getWSDLForNamespace(java.lang.String aNamespace)
                                            throws AeException
Returns the wsdl source for a passed namespace or null if none.

Parameters:
aNamespace - The namespace to retrieve the input source for.
Throws:
AeException

getWSDLLocationForNamespace

public java.lang.String getWSDLLocationForNamespace(java.lang.String aNamespace)
                                             throws AeException
Returns the url for the wsdl source for a passed namespace or null if none.

Parameters:
aNamespace - The namespace to retrieve the input source for.
Throws:
AeException
